Pine Flats Hot Springs

Description

Nude To Prude Scale

Nudity Potential At Pine Flats: While popular, this is still pretty remote, so be open witnessing nature.

Prude

Nude

Directions

As with the other Garden Valley hot springs, Pine Flats is pretty easy to find. Head the Banks Lowman Highway.

If you're coming from Lowman, you'll go 5.7 Miles from the 'T' in the major roads towards Banks. You'll come across the campground on the river side, you can either park in the campground or just up the road a bit is a pullout that's a little closer but harder to get down. Expect a 5-10 minute walk either way.

If you're coming from Banks, head 28.2 miles up the highway towards Lowman. On the right you'll see the pull out, and the campground with its parking is just up the road.

Be sure to explore the area around the obvious hot springs, there are a few hidden pools around the area that are great for a private soak.
